remarks: The result of an inverse matrix transformation.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 14-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cpm2mfval.i $e |- I = ( N cPolyMatToMat R ) $.
cpm2mfval.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpm2mval $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. S ) -> ( I ` M ) = ( x e. N , y e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( x M y ) ) ` 0 ) ) ) $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d R x y $.
